tool.name: CalculateScenicInventoryValues

param.name: viewedLandscapes
param.dialogReference: Viewed landscapes feature class to update. (Use Create Viewed Landscape Polygons tool to create). Preferably, this is the projected feature class.
param.pythonReference: Viewed landscapes feature class to update. (Use Create Viewed Landscape Polygons tool to create). Preferably, this is the projected feature class.

param.name: sivSource
param.dialogReference:
The Enjoy the View master database.

Use Database Connections\ETV_on_INP2300VIRMASQL_ETV_Reader.sde
param.pythonReference:
The Enjoy the View master database.

Use Database Connections\ETV_on_INP2300VIRMASQL_ETV_Reader.sde

tool.summary:
Using viewed landscape polygon feature class, adds attributes for scenic quality and view importance ratings, and scenic inventory value and ranking. Populates these attributes using information from the Enjoy the View master database. Note: scenic inventory value and ranking values will not be calculated if view importance is missing in the master database.

Tool output:

  • In the viewed landscape feature class, attributes for scenic quality and view importance ratings, scenic inventory value and scenic inventory ranking.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: NPS Inventory and Monitoring Division, NPS Air Resources Division
